summary: This appears to be a brief, garbled internal email or memo regarding Jeffrey Epstein, referencing his registration number and the discontinuation of 'Psych Ops' at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York. The text is heavily corrupted, making detailed analysis difficult.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Referenced by his federal registration number (76318-054) in the context of an internal correctional facility communication.

events.title: Psych Ops Discontinued
events.description: Psychological operations or monitoring related to inmate Jeffrey Epstein were discontinued at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, 150 Park Row
keyFacts: The document is an internal communication dated August 10, 2019, referencing inmate Jeffrey Epstein (Reg. No. 76318-054).
It states that 'Psych Ops' (Psychological Operations) on Epstein were discontinued on July 30, 2018, at 8:15 AM.
The communication appears to originate from or is addressed to the Associate Warden at the MCC New York facility.
The body of the text is largely corrupted and unreadable, limiting further factual extraction.
